Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; discoloured white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; exterior: broken maeander pattern between narrow bands at rim; below, painted decoration consisting of part of lion’s head to right; graffito inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 290, no. 883)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1109) (phase 2)
